RstoxData 1.3.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Get RstoxData definitions

Source: R/Definitions.R
getRstoxDataDefinitions.Rd

This function gets vital definitions from the RstoxData environment.

getRstoxDataDefinitions(name = NULL, ...)

Arguments

name

An optional string vector denoting which definitions to extract.

...

values overriding the values of definitions.

Value

A list of definitions.

Examples

getRstoxDataDefinitions()
#> $digits
#> [1] 12
#> 
#> $fpath
#> [1] "/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/RstoxData/extdata"
#> 
#> $getNAByType
#> function (type = c("numeric", "double", "integer", "character")) 
#> {
#>     type <- match.arg(type)
#>     NA_classes[[type]]
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x7feaf6fc6658>
#> <environment: 0x7feaf6fc5e08>
#> 
#> $ICESAcousticKeys
#> $ICESAcousticKeys$Cruise
#> [1] "LocalID"
#> 
#> $ICESAcousticKeys$Log
#> [1] "LocalID"  "Distance"
#> 
#> $ICESAcousticKeys$Sample
#> [1] "LocalID"           "Distance"          "ChannelDepthUpper"
#> 
#> $ICESAcousticKeys$Data
#> [1] "LocalID"           "Distance"          "ChannelDepthUpper"
#> [4] "SaCategory"       
#> 
#> 
#> $ICESBioticKeys
#> $ICESBioticKeys$Cruise
#> [1] "LocalID"
#> 
#> $ICESBioticKeys$Haul
#> [1] "LocalID" "Gear"    "Number" 
#> 
#> $ICESBioticKeys$Catch
#> [1] "LocalID"         "Gear"            "Number"          "SpeciesCode"    
#> [5] "SpeciesCategory"
#> 
#> $ICESBioticKeys$Biology
#> [1] "LocalID"         "Gear"            "Number"          "SpeciesCode"    
#> [5] "SpeciesCategory" "StockCode"       "FishID"         
#> 
#> 
#> $NA_classes

#> [1] NA
#>

#> [1] NA
#>

#> 
#>

#> [5] "nmdbioticv1.4"
#>

#> [1] 6
